root_object.name: AS GSS Update Solicitation Public Folder Security On Create Eval

process_model.name: AS GSS Update Solicitation Public Folder Security On Create Eval
process_model.description: process model to update Solicitation Public folder security  in GCW  from create eval process

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_STARTPROCESS_updateSolicPublicFolderSecurityOnCreateEval
called_by: AS GSS Update Solicitation Public Folder Security On Create Eval

expression_rules.name: AS_FRM_doesRuleExist
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the passed in rule exists in the system, uses plugin function `doesruleexist()`

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

inputs.name: checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull
inputs.description: Pass true if the rule input value is a CDT and check if all fields of the CDT is null.

test_cases.test_name: Value with list of CDT with all null fields
List of CDT with one of them not null

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_typeCompare
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the two input types match

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_FRM_getRuleReferenceOrNoOp
expression_rules.description: Returns either a rule reference to the input rule, or a no-operation if the rule does not exist, uses plugin function `rulereferencebyname()`

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains
expression_rules.description: Enhanced wherecontains() which avoids type-casting issues and properly handles for document and group types

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMapList
expression_rules.description: Casts the input to a map list
